meanings.sent1: The old, rusted car sat in the driveway.
meanings.sent2: The metal gate was rusted and difficult to open.
meanings.sent3: The rusted bike looked like it had been in a battle with time.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt rusted with sadness after the loss.
meanings.sent5: The rusted lock refused to budge, holding tight to its secrets.

meanings.sent1: If you leave metal outside, it will eventually get rusted.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned bike quickly rusted in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The tools rusted together, forming a metal family reunion.
meanings.sent4: His dreams rusted away as he grew older.
meanings.sent5: The neglected swing set rusted over the years, forgotten in the backyard.

meanings.definition: To deteriorate or become impaired due to neglect or lack of use.
meanings.sent1: Without practice, his skills began to rusted away.
meanings.sent2: The relationship rusted over time, lacking attention and care.
meanings.sent3: His brain felt rusted from lack of mental exercise.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned building rusted into a ghostly shell of its former self.
meanings.sent5: Her talents rusted in the shadows, waiting to be polished and used once more.
